00035 using namespace std;
00036 using namespace affxcel;
00037 using namespace affymetrix_fusion_io;

00043 /*
00044  * Initialize the class.
00045  */
00046 CELFileComparer::CELFileComparer(bool newDetailedDiffFile, float newTolerance, bool newIgnoreMask, bool newCelSummary, bool newIgnoreHeaders)
00047 {
00048         detailedDiffFile = newDetailedDiffFile;
00049         float_tolerance = newTolerance;
00050         ignoreMask = newIgnoreMask;
00051         ignoreHeaders = newIgnoreHeaders;
00052         celSummary = newCelSummary;
00053 }
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * Deallocate any memory.
00057  */
00058 CELFileComparer::~CELFileComparer()
00059 {
00060         CloseFile();
00061 }
00062 
00063 /*
00064  * Closes the open files.
00065  */
00066 void CELFileComparer::CloseFile()
00067 {
00068         gcos.Clear();
00069         streamCompare.close();
00070 }
00071 
00072 /*
00073  * Read the CEL file into a data object.
00074  */
00075 bool CELFileComparer::ReadGCOSFile()
00076 {
00077         gcos.SetFileName(fileNameGCOS.c_str());
00078         bool status = gcos.Read();
00079         if (status == false)
00080                 errorCode = UnableToOpenCelFile;
00081         return status;
00082 }
00083 
00084 /*
00085  * Read the CEL file into a data object.
00086  */
00087 bool CELFileComparer::ReadCalvinFile()
00088 {
00089         //fusion.SetFileName();
00090         fusion.ReadEx(fileNameCalvin.c_str(),FusionCELData::CEL_ALL);
00091         return true;
00092 }
00093 
00094 /*
00095  * Convert the file.
00096  *
00097  * First check the validity of the file.
00098  *      Is it a calvin file? 
00099  *
00100  * Read the GCOS file.
00101  *
00102  */
00103 bool CELFileComparer::CompareFiles()
00104 {
00105         errorCode = NoError;
00106 
00107         // Read the GCOS file.
00108         if (ReadGCOSFile() == false)
00109                 return false;
00110 
00111         // Read the GCOS file.
00112         ReadCalvinFile();
00113 
00114         // Clear the output file list
00115         outputFile = fileNameCalvin + ".comparison";
00116 
00117         // Create a Calvin CEL file.
00118         bool status = Compare();
00119 
00120         // Close the file and return the status.
00121         CloseFile();
00122 
00123         return status;
00124 }
00125 
00126 /*
00127  * Create a Calvin CEL file.
00128  *
00129  * Issues:
00130  *      DatHeader is missing.
00131  *      Grid is missing.
00132  *      Intensities should be float's not int's - do we store them in the GCOS 1 digit precision?
00133  *      There is a bug in writing the outlier and mask sections when no data exists.
00134  *
00135  */
00136 bool CELFileComparer::Compare()
00137 {
00138         bool compareResults = true;
00139 
00140         Fs::aptOpen(streamCompare, outputFile);
00141         time_t ltime;
00142         time(&ltime );
00143 
00144 #ifdef WIN32
00145         wchar_t buf[26];
00146         _wctime_s(buf, 26, &ltime);
00147         streamCompare << "Time stamp: " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(wstring(buf)) << endl << endl;
00148 #endif
00149 
00150         ///---------------------
00151         /// Commented out by Breck (20060712) for the header varaible was not used. The original purpose was to 
00152         /// compare the gocs header to the calvin gcos dat header that was inserted. Not sure if the 
00153         /// gcos header ever made it into the calvin header. If it does, uncomment this code and add 
00154         ///the call to the calvin gcos data header and compare.
00155         ///CCELFileHeaderData &gcosHeader = gcos.GetHeader();
00156         ///---------------------
00157 
00158         CelFileReader cr;
00159         CelFileData data;
00160         cr.SetFilename(fileNameCalvin.c_str());
00161         cr.Read(data);
00162 
00163         if (!ignoreHeaders)
00164         {
00165                 if(fusion.GetAlg().compare(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcos.GetAlg())) != 0)
00166                 {
00167                         //Algorithm names need not match, do not flag as a failure
00168                         streamCompare << "Algorithm Names mismatch: GCOS = " << gcos.GetAlg() << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(fusion.GetAlg()) << endl << endl;
00169                 }
00170 
00171                 if(int32_t(gcos.GetCols()) != fusion.GetCols())
00172                 {
00173                         compareResults = false;
00174                         streamCompare << "Columns: GCOS = " << gcos.GetCols() << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetCols() << endl << endl;
00175                 }
00176 
00177                 if(int32_t(gcos.GetRows()) != fusion.GetRows())
00178                 {
00179                         compareResults = false;
00180                         streamCompare << "Rows: GCOS = " << gcos.GetRows() << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetRows() << endl << endl;
00181                 }
00182 
00183                 if(fusion.GetChipType().compare(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcos.GetChipType())) != 0)
00184                 {
00185                         compareResults = false;
00186                         streamCompare << "Chip Type: GCOS = " << gcos.GetChipType() << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(fusion.GetChipType()) << endl << endl;
00187                 }
00188 
00189                 if(fusion.GetCellMargin() != gcos.GetCellMargin())
00190                 {
00191                         compareResults = false;
00192                         streamCompare << "CellMargin: GCOS = " << gcos.GetCellMargin() << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetCellMargin() << endl << endl;
00193                 }
00194 
00195                 if(fusion.GetNumCells() != gcos.GetNumCells())
00196                 {
00197                         compareResults = false;
00198                         streamCompare << "NumCells: GCOS = " << gcos.GetNumCells() << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetNumCells() << endl << endl;
00199                 }
00200         }
00201 
00202         if (!ignoreMask)
00203         {
00204                 if(fusion.GetNumMasked() != gcos.GetNumMasked())
00205                 {
00206                         {
00207                                 compareResults = false;
00208                                 streamCompare << "NumMasked: GCOS = " << gcos.GetNumMasked() << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetNumMasked() << endl << endl;
00209                         }
00210                 }
00211         }
00212 
00213         //If comparing CelSummary data, compare mask total to celSummary total
00214         if (celSummary)
00215         {
00216                 std::string dgName("Default Group");
00217                 std::string dsName("CelSummaryReport");
00218 
00219                 //Data Comparison
00220                 DataSet* ds1=NULL;
00221                 bool celSummaryDsExists = true;
00222 
00223                 try
00224                 {
00225                         ds1 = fusion.GetGenericData()->DataSet(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(dgName), StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(dsName));
00226                 }
00227                 catch (affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException)
00228                 {
00229                         streamCompare << "CelSummaryReport data set was not found in the CEL file.  Use -cs option only if comparing CEL files with this dataset."  << endl << endl;
00230                         compareResults = false;
00231                         celSummaryDsExists = false;
00232                 }
00233 
00234                 if (celSummaryDsExists)
00235                 {
00236                         ds1->Open();
00237 
00238                         int celSumRows = ds1->Rows();
00239 
00240                         if(celSumRows != gcos.GetNumMasked())
00241                         {
00242                                 {
00243                                         compareResults = false;
00244                                         streamCompare << "Mismatch in number of CelSummary points vs. GCOS masked points."  << endl << endl;
00245                                         streamCompare << "NumMasked: GCOS = " << gcos.GetNumMasked() << "\t NumCelSummaryReport = " << celSumRows << endl << endl;
00246                                 }
00247                         }
00248 
00249                         // For each value in the CelSummary section, compare GCOS to see that the corresponding location is masked.  If not, it fails.
00250                         // If all the corresponding locations are masked, and the counts match, the result is a pass.
00251 
00252                         for (int i=0; i < celSumRows; i++)
00253                         {
00254                                 int32_t xLocation;
00255                                 int32_t yLocation;
00256 
00257                                 try
00258                                 {
00259                                         ds1->GetData(i, 0, xLocation);
00260                                         ds1->GetData(i, 1, yLocation);
00261                                 }
00262                                 catch (...)
00263                                 {
00264                                         compareResults = false;
00265                                         streamCompare << "Error reading Calvin CelSummary data group."  << endl << endl;
00266                                         break;
00267                                 }
00268 
00269                                 //If location isn't masked in GCOS, it fails
00270                                 if (!gcos.IsMasked(xLocation, yLocation))
00271                                 {
00272                                         compareResults = false;
00273                                         streamCompare << "CelSummary point not masked in GCOS: (" << xLocation << ", " << yLocation << ")" << endl;
00274                                 }
00275 
00276                         }
00277 
00278                         //Add endl to make comparison file easier to read
00279                         if (!compareResults)
00280                                 streamCompare << endl;
00281                 }
00282         }
00283 
00284         if(fusion.GetNumOutliers() != gcos.GetNumOutliers())
00285         {
00286                 compareResults = false;
00287                 streamCompare << "NumOutliers: GCOS = " << gcos.GetNumOutliers() << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetNumOutliers() << endl << endl;
00288         }
00289 
00290 
00291         //if(fusion.GetVersion() != gcos.GetVersion())
00292         ////////{
00293         ////////        compareResults = false;
00294         ////////        streamCompare << "Version: GCOS = " << gcos.GetVersion() << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetVersion() << endl << endl;
00295         ////////}
00296 
00297         /// ------------------------
00298         /// Commented out by Breck (20060712)- This was not doing anything and am not sure why it is here. I do not remember what the original purpose was for.
00299         /// It may have been for a feature I was trying to get into the converters so that we knew what GCOS version it was converted from so that if 
00300         /// we had converted to Calvin and then back to gcos, we would know the proper format for gcos as well as data allowed. Not sure if the converter
00301         /// ever did it.
00302         //ParameterNameValueType value, ;
00303 
00304         //data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"ConvertedSourceVersion",value); 
00305         //ParameterNameValueType::ParameterType type = value.GetParameterType();
00306         //data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"ConverterVersion",value);
00307         ///-------------------------
00308 
00309 
00310         /* Compare Algorithm parameters
00311          *
00312          * Step through each Calvin algorithm parameter, if it exists in GCOS,
00313          * determine the data type from Calvin, cast each value, and compare the
00314          * results.
00315          *
00316          * Keep a count of the number of matching parameters, this number is then
00317          * compared to the number of GCOS parameters, offset by one to
00318          * account for the missing parameter AlgVersion.
00319          * 
00320          */
00321 
00322         //Compare Headers only if ignoreHeaders is false
00323 
00324         if (!ignoreHeaders)
00325         {
00326                 //Get Calvin Algorithm Parameters
00327                 FusionTagValuePairTypeList& fusionList = fusion.GetParameters();
00328                 std::list<FusionTagValuePairType>::iterator fi = fusionList.begin();
00329 
00330                 //Expected number of matching keys
00331                 int gcosParamCount = gcos.GetNumberAlgorithmParameters() - 1;
00332 
00333                 for (int j=0; j < fusion.GetNumberAlgorithmParameters(); j++)
00334                 {
00335                         std::wstring key = fi->Tag;
00336                         std::wstring value = fi->Value;
00337 
00338                         std::string gcosKey = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(key);
00339                         
00340                         //Exception to map IgnoreShiftRowOutliers
00341                         if (key.compare(L"IgnoreShiftRowOutliers") == 0)
00342                                 gcosKey = "IgnoreOutliersInShiftRows";
00343 
00344                         //Exception to map PoolWidthExtenstion (GCOS) to ExtendPoolWidth (Calvin)
00345                         if (key.compare(L"ExtendPoolWidth") == 0)
00346                                 gcosKey = "PoolWidthExtenstion";
00347 
00348                         //Exception to map PoolHeightExtenstion (GCOS) to ExtendPoolHeight (Calvin)
00349                         if (key.compare(L"ExtendPoolHeight") == 0)
00350                                 gcosKey = "PoolHeightExtension";
00351 
00352                         std::string gcosValue = gcos.GetAlgorithmParameter(gcosKey.c_str());
00353 
00354                         //If GCOS parameter exists, compare values, decrement count
00355                         if (gcosValue.compare("") != 0)
00356                         {
00357                                 gcosParamCount--;
00358 
00359                                 //Based on type of Calvin data, make comparison
00360 
00361                                 //ASCII
00362                                 if (fi->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::AsciiType)
00363                                 {                       
00364                                         //Compare
00365                                         if (gcosValue.compare(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value)) != 0)
00366                                         {
00367                                                 streamCompare << "Mismatched ASCII Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00368                                                 compareResults = false;
00369                                         }
00370                                 }
00371                                 //Float
00372                                 else if (fi->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::FloatType)
00373                                 {
00374                                         float gcosFloat = (float) atof(gcosValue.c_str());
00375                                         float calvinFloat = (float) atof( (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value)).c_str());
00376 
00377                                         //Compare floats (exactly)
00378                                         if ( gcosFloat != calvinFloat )
00379                                         {
00380                                                 streamCompare << "Mismatched Float Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00381                                                 compareResults = false;
00382                                         }
00383                                 }
00384                                 //Int16
00385                                 else if (fi->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int16Type)
00386                                 {
00387                                         int16_t gcosInt16 = (int16_t) ( atoi(gcosValue.c_str()) );
00388                                         int16_t calvinInt16 = (int16_t) (atoi( StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value).c_str() ) );
00389 
00390                                         //Compare
00391                                         if (gcosInt16 != calvinInt16)
00392                                         {
00393                                                 streamCompare << "Mismatched Int16 Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00394                                                 compareResults = false;
00395                                         }
00396                                 }
00397                                 //Int32
00398                                 else if (fi->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int32Type)
00399                                 {
00400                                         int32_t gcosInt32 = (int32_t) ( atoi(gcosValue.c_str()) );
00401                                         int32_t calvinInt32 = (int32_t) (atoi( StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value).c_str() ) );
00402 
00403                                         //Compare
00404                                         if (gcosInt32 != calvinInt32)
00405                                         {
00406                                                 //For PoolHeightExtension, PoolWidthExtension parameters, a mismatch is expected, so no error should be thrown
00407                                                 if ( (gcosKey.compare("PoolWidthExtenstion") != 0) &&  (gcosKey.compare("PoolHeightExtension") != 0) )
00408                                                 {
00409                                                         streamCompare << "Mismatched Int32 Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00410                                                         compareResults = false;
00411                                                 }
00412                                                 else
00413                                                 {
00414                                                         streamCompare << "Mismatched Int32 Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00415                                                         streamCompare << "Mismatch for PoolHeightExtension, PoolHeightExtension not flagged as errors, mismatches are expected." << endl << endl;
00416                                                 }
00417                                         }
00418                                 }
00419                                 //Int8
00420                                 else if (fi->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::Int8Type)
00421                                 {
00422                                         int8_t gcosInt8 = (int8_t) ( atoi(gcosValue.c_str()) );
00423                                         int8_t calvinInt8 = (int8_t) (atoi( StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value).c_str() ) );
00424 
00425                                         //Compare
00426                                         if (gcosInt8 != calvinInt8)
00427                                         {
00428                                                 streamCompare << "Mismatched Int8 Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00429                                                 compareResults = false;
00430                                         }                                       
00431                                 }
00432                                 //Text
00433                                 else if (fi->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::TextType)
00434                                 {
00435                                         //Compare as string
00436                                         //If key is AlgVersion or FeatureExtraction, as mismatch is expected.  Log the difference, but no error
00437                                         if (gcosValue.compare(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value)) != 0)
00438                                         {
00439                                                 if ( (gcosKey.compare("AlgVersion") != 0) &&  (gcosKey.compare("FeatureExtraction") != 0) )
00440                                                 {
00441                                                         streamCompare << "Mismatched Text Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00442                                                         compareResults = false;
00443                                                 }
00444                                                 else
00445                                                 {
00446                                                         streamCompare << "Mismatched Text Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl;
00447                                                         streamCompare << "Mismatch for AlgVersion, FeatureExtraction not flagged as errors, mismatches are expected." << endl << endl;
00448                                                 }
00449                                         }                                       
00450                                 }
00451                                 //UInt8
00452                                 else if (fi->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type)
00453                                 {
00454                                         uint8_t gcosUInt8 = (uint8_t) ( atoi(gcosValue.c_str()) );
00455                                         uint8_t calvinUInt8 = (uint8_t) (atoi( StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value).c_str() ) );
00456 
00457                                         //Compare
00458                                         if (gcosUInt8 != calvinUInt8)
00459                                         {
00460                                                 streamCompare << "Mismatched UInt8 Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00461                                                 compareResults = false;
00462                                         }                                               
00463                                 }
00464                                 //UInt16
00465                                 else if (fi->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::UInt16Type)
00466                                 {
00467                                         uint16_t gcosUInt16 = (uint16_t) ( atoi(gcosValue.c_str()) );
00468                                         uint16_t calvinUInt16 = (uint16_t) (atoi( StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value).c_str() ) );
00469 
00470                                         //Compare
00471                                         if (gcosUInt16 != calvinUInt16)
00472                                         {
00473                                                 streamCompare << "Mismatched UInt16 Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00474                                                 compareResults = false;
00475                                         }                               
00476                                 }
00477                                 //UInt32
00478                                 else if (fi->DetailedType().GetParameterType() == ParameterNameValueType::UInt32Type)
00479                                 {
00480                                         uint32_t gcosUInt32 = (uint32_t) ( atoi(gcosValue.c_str()) );
00481                                         uint32_t calvinUInt32 = (uint32_t) (atoi( StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value).c_str() ) );
00482 
00483                                         //Compare
00484                                         if (gcosUInt32 != calvinUInt32)
00485                                         {
00486                                                 streamCompare << "Mismatched UInt32 Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00487                                                 compareResults = false;
00488                                         }                                       
00489                                 }
00490                                 //Default, compare as string
00491                                 else
00492                                 {
00493                                         //Compare
00494                                         if (gcosValue.compare(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value)) != 0)
00495                                         {
00496                                                 streamCompare << "Mismatched ASCII Parameter value by key(" << gcosKey << "): GCOS = " << gcosValue << "\tCalvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(value) << endl << endl;
00497                                                 compareResults = false;
00498                                         }                                       
00499                                 }
00500 
00501 
00502                         }
00503 
00504                         fi++;
00505                 }
00506 
00507                 // Check matching parameter count, count should have decremented to 0 if all parameters were found
00508                 //
00509                 // If totals do not match, iterate through GCOS parameters and list those that are not present
00510                 if (gcosParamCount > 0)
00511                 {
00512                         for (int i = 0; i < gcos.GetNumberAlgorithmParameters(); i++)
00513                         {
00514                                 std::wstring calvinKey = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcos.GetAlgorithmParameterTag(i));
00515                                 
00516                                 //If Calvin does not contain the parameter, report it
00517                                 //Ignore AlgVersion, IgnoreShiftRowOutliers, PoolWidthExtenstion, PoolHeightExtenstion, NumDATSubgrids
00518                                 if ( (calvinKey.compare(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("AlgVersion")) != 0)       && (calvinKey.compare(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("IgnoreOutliersInShiftRows")) != 0)
00519                                         && (calvinKey.compare(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("PoolWidthExtenstion")) != 0) && (calvinKey.compare(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("PoolHeightExtension")) != 0)
00520                                         && (calvinKey.compare(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("NumDATSubgrids")) != 0))
00521                                 {
00522                                                 if (fusion.GetAlgorithmParameter(calvinKey.c_str()).compare(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("")) == 0)
00523                                                 {
00524                                                         streamCompare << "GCOS parameter " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(calvinKey) << " not found in Calvin Cel file." << endl;
00525                                                         compareResults = false;
00526                                                 }
00527                                 }
00528                         }
00529                 }
00530 
00531                 // check to see if we can get the grid coords from the parameter array directly
00532         #ifdef WIN32
00533                 if(fusion.GetNumberAlgorithmParameters())
00534                 {
00535                         GridCoordinatesType gcosGridType = gcos.GetGridCorners();
00536                         affymetrix_fusion_io::FGridCoords fusionGridType;
00537                         wstring value = fusion.GetAlgorithmParameter(L"GridULX");
00538                         fusionGridType.upperleft.x = (float)_wtof(value.c_str());
00539                         value = fusion.GetAlgorithmParameter(L"GridULY");
00540                         fusionGridType.upperleft.y = (float)_wtof(value.c_str());
00541                         value = fusion.GetAlgorithmParameter(L"GridURX");
00542                         fusionGridType.upperright.x = (float)_wtof(value.c_str());
00543                         value = fusion.GetAlgorithmParameter(L"GridURY");
00544                         fusionGridType.upperright.y = (float)_wtof(value.c_str());
00545                         value = fusion.GetAlgorithmParameter(L"GridLRX");
00546                         fusionGridType.lowerright.x = (float)_wtof(value.c_str());
00547                         value = fusion.GetAlgorithmParameter(L"GridLRY");
00548                         fusionGridType.lowerright.y = (float)_wtof(value.c_str());
00549                         value = fusion.GetAlgorithmParameter(L"GridLLX");
00550                         fusionGridType.lowerleft.x = (float)_wtof(value.c_str());
00551                         value = fusion.GetAlgorithmParameter(L"GridLLY");
00552                         fusionGridType.lowerleft.y = (float)_wtof(value.c_str());
00553 
00554                         if((int32_t)fusionGridType.upperleft.x != gcosGridType.upperleft.x   ||
00555                         (int32_t)fusionGridType.upperleft.y != gcosGridType.upperleft.y   ||
00556                         (int32_t)fusionGridType.lowerleft.x != gcosGridType.lowerleft.x   ||
00557                         (int32_t)fusionGridType.lowerleft.y != gcosGridType.lowerleft.y   ||
00558                         (int32_t)fusionGridType.upperright.x != gcosGridType.upperright.x ||
00559                         (int32_t)fusionGridType.upperright.y != gcosGridType.upperright.y ||
00560                         (int32_t)fusionGridType.lowerright.x != gcosGridType.lowerright.x ||
00561                         (int32_t)fusionGridType.lowerright.y != gcosGridType.lowerright.y)
00562                         {
00563                                 streamCompare << "GridCoordinatesType:" << endl;
00564                                 streamCompare << "\tGCOS lowerleft.x    = " << gcosGridType.lowerleft.x << "\t\tCalvin lowerleft.x              = " << fusionGridType.lowerleft.x  << endl;
00565                                 streamCompare << "\tGCOS lowerleft.y    = " << gcosGridType.lowerleft.y << "\t\tCalvin lowerleft.y              = " << fusionGridType.lowerleft.y  << endl;
00566                                 streamCompare << "\tGCOS lowerright.x   = " << gcosGridType.lowerright.x << "\t\tCalvin lowerright.x    = " << fusionGridType.lowerright.x << endl;
00567                                 streamCompare << "\tGCOS lowerright.y   = " << gcosGridType.lowerright.y << "\t\tCalvin lowerright.y    = " << fusionGridType.lowerright.y << endl;
00568                                 streamCompare << "\tGCOS upperleft.x    = " << gcosGridType.upperleft.x << "\t\tCalvin upperleft.x              = " << fusionGridType.upperleft.x  << endl;
00569                                 streamCompare << "\tGCOS upperrleft.y   = " << gcosGridType.upperleft.y << "\t\tCalvin upperrleft.y             = " << fusionGridType.upperleft.y  << endl;
00570                                 streamCompare << "\tGCOS upperright.x   = " << gcosGridType.upperright.x << "\t\tCalvin upperright.x    = " << fusionGridType.upperright.x << endl;
00571                                 streamCompare << "\tGCOS upperright.y   = " << gcosGridType.upperright.y << "\t\tCalvin upperright.y    = " << fusionGridType.upperright.y << endl << endl;
00572                         }
00573                 }
00574         #endif
00575 
00576                 if(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcos.GetDatHeader()).compare(fusion.GetDatHeader()) != 0)
00577                 {
00578                         //DAT headers need not match, do not flag as a failure
00579                         streamCompare << "Dat Header String: GCOS = " << gcos.GetDatHeader() << endl << "Calvin = " << StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(fusion.GetDatHeader()) << endl << endl;
00580                 }
00581 
00582                 /*
00583                  * Compare DAT header strings between GCOS and Calvin files.
00584                  * 
00585                  * Header strings are comprised of multiple parts, so the string must be broken down and compared
00586                  * piece by piece, with exceptions made for those segments that will not match due to designed in
00587                  * differences in the formats (e.g. filenames, algorithm names may not match).
00588                  */
00589 
00590                 std::string gcosDATHeader = gcos.GetDatHeader();
00591                 std::string calvinDATHeader = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(fusion.GetDatHeader());
00592 
00593                 //Try/Catch block around all comparisons; any exceptions indicate failure
00594 
00595                 try
00596                 {
00597                         //Compare min pixel values
00598                         int gcosMinPixel = atoi(gcosDATHeader.substr(gcosDATHeader.find_first_of("[") + 1, gcosDATHeader.find_first_of("..")).c_str());
00599                         int calvinMinPixel = atoi(calvinDATHeader.substr(calvinDATHeader.find_first_of("[") + 1, calvinDATHeader.find_first_of("..")).c_str());
00600 
00601                         if(gcosMinPixel != calvinMinPixel)
00602                         {
00603                                 compareResults = false;
00604                                 streamCompare << "Minimum Pixel values mismatch: GCOS = " << gcosMinPixel << endl << "Calvin = " << calvinMinPixel << endl << endl;
00605                         }
00606 
00607                         //Compare max pixel values
00608                         int gcosMaxPixel = atoi(gcosDATHeader.substr(gcosDATHeader.find("..") + 2, gcosDATHeader.find("]")).c_str());
00609                         int calvinMaxPixel = atoi(calvinDATHeader.substr(calvinDATHeader.find("..") + 2, calvinDATHeader.find("]")).c_str());
00610 
00611                         if(gcosMaxPixel != calvinMaxPixel)
00612                         {
00613                                 compareResults = false;
00614                                 streamCompare << "Maximum Pixel values mismatch: GCOS = " << gcosMaxPixel << endl << "Calvin = " << calvinMaxPixel << endl << endl;
00615                         }
00616                         
00617                         //Ignore DAT file names, as they will not necessarily match
00618 
00619                         //Remove string start up to columns
00620                         gcosDATHeader = gcosDATHeader.substr(gcosDATHeader.find("CLS="), gcosDATHeader.length() - gcosDATHeader.find("CLS=") );
00621                         calvinDATHeader = calvinDATHeader.substr(calvinDATHeader.find("CLS="), calvinDATHeader.length() - calvinDATHeader.find("CLS="));
00622 
00623                         //Compare columns values
00624                         int gcosColumns = atoi(gcosDATHeader.substr(4, gcosDATHeader.find("RWS=") - 4).c_str());
00625                         int calvinColumns = atoi(calvinDATHeader.substr(4, calvinDATHeader.find("RWS=") - 4).c_str());
00626 
00627                         if(gcosColumns != calvinColumns)
00628                         {
00629                                 compareResults = false;
00630                                 streamCompare << "Columns values mismatch: GCOS = " << gcosColumns << endl << "Calvin = " << calvinColumns << endl << endl;
00631                         }
00632 
00633                         //Remove string start up to rows
00634                         gcosDATHeader = gcosDATHeader.substr(gcosDATHeader.find("RWS="), gcosDATHeader.length() - gcosDATHeader.find("RWS=") );
00635                         calvinDATHeader = calvinDATHeader.substr(calvinDATHeader.find("RWS="), calvinDATHeader.length() - calvinDATHeader.find("RWS="));
00636 
00637                         //Compare rows values
00638                         int gcosRows = atoi(gcosDATHeader.substr(4, gcosDATHeader.find("XIN=") - 4).c_str());
00639                         int calvinRows = atoi(calvinDATHeader.substr(4, calvinDATHeader.find("XIN=") - 4).c_str());
00640 
00641                         if(gcosRows != calvinRows)
00642                         {
00643                                 compareResults = false;
00644                                 streamCompare << "Rows values mismatch: GCOS = " << gcosRows << endl << "Calvin = " << calvinRows << endl << endl;
00645                         }
00646 
00647                         //Remove string start up to XIN (x-pixel size)
00648                         gcosDATHeader = gcosDATHeader.substr(gcosDATHeader.find("XIN="), gcosDATHeader.length() - gcosDATHeader.find("XIN=") );
00649                         calvinDATHeader = calvinDATHeader.substr(calvinDATHeader.find("XIN="), calvinDATHeader.length() - calvinDATHeader.find("XIN="));
00650 
00651                         //Compare Xin values
00652                         int gcosXin = atoi(gcosDATHeader.substr(4, gcosDATHeader.find("YIN=") - 4).c_str());
00653                         int calvinXin = atoi(calvinDATHeader.substr(4, calvinDATHeader.find("YIN=") - 4).c_str());
00654 
00655                         if(gcosColumns != calvinColumns)
00656                         {
00657                                 compareResults = false;
00658                                 streamCompare << "XIN Pixel size values mismatch: GCOS = " << gcosXin << endl << "calvinXin = " << calvinXin << endl << endl;
00659                         }
00660 
00661                         //Remove string start up to YIN (y-pixel size)
00662                         gcosDATHeader = gcosDATHeader.substr(gcosDATHeader.find("YIN="), gcosDATHeader.length() - gcosDATHeader.find("YIN=") );
00663                         calvinDATHeader = calvinDATHeader.substr(calvinDATHeader.find("YIN="), calvinDATHeader.length() - calvinDATHeader.find("YIN="));
00664 
00665                         //Compare Yin values
00666                         int gcosYin = atoi(gcosDATHeader.substr(4, gcosDATHeader.find("VE=") - 4).c_str());
00667                         int calvinYin = atoi(calvinDATHeader.substr(4, calvinDATHeader.find("VE=") - 4).c_str());
00668 
00669                         if(gcosYin != calvinYin)
00670                         {
00671                                 compareResults = false;
00672                                 streamCompare << "YIN Pixel size values mismatch: GCOS = " << gcosYin << endl << "Calvin = " << calvinYin << endl << endl;
00673                         }
00674 
00675                         //Remove string start up to VE (scan speed)
00676                         //These need not match
00677                         gcosDATHeader = gcosDATHeader.substr(gcosDATHeader.find("VE="), gcosDATHeader.length() - gcosDATHeader.find("VE=") );
00678                         calvinDATHeader = calvinDATHeader.substr(calvinDATHeader.find("VE="), calvinDATHeader.length() - calvinDATHeader.find("VE="));
00679 
00680                         //Compare VE values
00681                         int gcosVE= atoi(gcosDATHeader.substr(3, gcosDATHeader.find("VE=") - 4).c_str());
00682                         int calvinVE = atoi(calvinDATHeader.substr(3, calvinDATHeader.find("VE=") - 4).c_str());
00683 
00684                         if(gcosVE != calvinVE)
00685                         {
00686                                 //Values need not match, do not flag as a failure
00687                                 streamCompare << "VE (scan speed) values mismatch: " << endl << "GCOS VE= " << gcosVE << endl << "Calvin VE = " << calvinVE << endl << endl;
00688                         }
00689 
00690                         //Trim VE data from headers
00691                         gcosDATHeader = gcosDATHeader.substr(gcosDATHeader.find(" "), gcosDATHeader.length() - gcosDATHeader.find(" ") );
00692                         calvinDATHeader = calvinDATHeader.substr(calvinDATHeader.find(" "), calvinDATHeader.length() - calvinDATHeader.find(" "));
00693                         trim(gcosDATHeader);
00694                         trim(calvinDATHeader);
00695 
00696                         //Compare remaining header strings, should match once code is complete
00697                         if (gcosDATHeader.compare(calvinDATHeader) != 0)
00698                         {
00699                                 //HACK: Don't flag as a failure yet - change when code is complete, uncommenting line below:
00700                                 //
00701                                 //compareResults = false;
00702                                 //
00703                                 streamCompare << "Dat Headers don't match" << endl;
00704                                 streamCompare << "GCOS DAT Header   : " << gcosDATHeader << endl;
00705                                 streamCompare << "Calvin DAT Header : " << calvinDATHeader << endl << endl;
00706                         }
00707                 }
00708                 catch (...)
00709                 {
00710                                 streamCompare << "Dat Headers don't match" << endl;
00711                                 streamCompare << "GCOS DAT Header   : " << gcosDATHeader << endl;
00712                                 streamCompare << "Calvin DAT Header : " << calvinDATHeader << endl << endl;
00713                 }
00714         }
00715 
00716         int32_t diffIntensities = 0;
00717         int32_t diffStdev = 0;
00718         int32_t diffPixels = 0;
00719         int32_t diffMasks = 0;
00720         int32_t diffOutliers = 0;
00721 
00722         int count  = gcos.GetNumCells();
00723         int x = 0, y = 0;
00724         CELFileEntryType gcosEntry;
00725         FusionCELFileEntryType fusionEntry;
00726         for(int i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00727         {
00728                 x = gcos.IndexToX(i);
00729                 y = gcos.IndexToY(i);
00730 
00731                 if(gcos.XYToIndex(x,y) != fusion.XYToIndex(x,y) || gcos.XYToIndex(x,y) != i || fusion.XYToIndex(x,y) != i)
00732                 {
00733                         compareResults = false;
00734 
00735                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00736                                 streamCompare << "XYToIndex(Index: " << i << "\t" << x << "," << y << "): GCOS = " << gcos.XYToIndex(x,y) << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.XYToIndex(x,y) << endl << endl;
00737                 }
00738 
00739                 if( !CompareFloats(gcos.GetStdv(i), fusion.GetStdv(i)) )
00740                 {
00741                         ++diffStdev;
00742 
00743                         compareResults = false;
00744                         
00745                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00746                                 streamCompare << "Stdv by index(" << i << "): GCOS = " << gcos.GetStdv(i) << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetStdv(i) << endl << endl;
00747                 }
00748 
00749                 if ( !CompareFloats(gcos.GetStdv(x,y), fusion.GetStdv(x,y)) )
00750                 {
00751                         compareResults = false;
00752                         
00753                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00754                                 streamCompare << "Stdv by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "): GCOS = " << gcos.GetStdv(x,y) << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetStdv(x,y) << endl << endl;
00755                 }
00756 
00757                 if(gcos.GetPixels(i) != fusion.GetPixels(i))
00758                 {
00759                         ++diffPixels;
00760 
00761                         compareResults = false;
00762                         
00763                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00764                                 streamCompare << "Pixels by index(" << i << "): GCOS = " << gcos.GetPixels(i) << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetPixels(i) << endl << endl;
00765                 }
00766                 if(gcos.GetPixels(x,y) != fusion.GetPixels(x,y))
00767                 {
00768                         compareResults = false;
00769                         
00770                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00771                                 streamCompare << "Pixels by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "): GCOS = " << gcos.GetPixels(x,y) << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetPixels(x,y) << endl << endl;
00772                 }
00773 
00774                 if(!CompareFloats(gcos.GetIntensity(i), fusion.GetIntensity(i)))
00775                 {
00776                         ++diffIntensities;
00777 
00778                         compareResults = false;
00779                         
00780                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00781                                 streamCompare << "Intensity by index(" << i << "): GCOS = " << gcos.GetIntensity(i) << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetIntensity(i) << endl << endl;
00782                 }
00783 
00784                 if (!CompareFloats(gcos.GetIntensity(x,y), fusion.GetIntensity(x,y)))
00785                 {
00786                         compareResults = false;
00787                         
00788                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00789                                 streamCompare << "Intensity by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "): GCOS = " << gcos.GetIntensity(x,y) << "\tCalvin = " << fusion.GetIntensity(x,y) << endl << endl;
00790                 }
00791 
00792                 gcos.GetEntry(i,gcosEntry);
00793                 fusion.GetEntry(i,fusionEntry);
00794 
00795                 if(!CompareFloats(fusionEntry.Intensity, gcosEntry.Intensity) || fusionEntry.Pixels != gcosEntry.Pixels || !CompareFloats(fusionEntry.Stdv, gcosEntry.Stdv) )
00796                 {
00797                         compareResults = false;
00798                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00799                         {       
00800                                 streamCompare << "Entry by index(" << i << ")" << endl;
00801                                 streamCompare << "\tIntensity:  GCOS = " << gcosEntry.Intensity << "\tCalvin = " << fusionEntry.Intensity << endl;
00802                                 streamCompare << "\tPixels:     GCOS = " << gcosEntry.Pixels << "\tCalvin = " << fusionEntry.Pixels << endl;
00803                                 streamCompare << "\tStdv:       GCOS = " << gcosEntry.Stdv << "\tCalvin = " << fusionEntry.Stdv << endl;
00804                         }
00805                 }
00806 
00807                 gcos.GetEntry(x,y,gcosEntry);
00808                 fusion.GetEntry(x,y,fusionEntry);
00809 
00810                 if(!CompareFloats(fusionEntry.Intensity, gcosEntry.Intensity) || fusionEntry.Pixels != gcosEntry.Pixels || !CompareFloats(fusionEntry.Stdv, gcosEntry.Stdv))
00811                 {
00812                         compareResults = false;
00813                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00814                         {       
00815                                 streamCompare << "Entry by x,y(" << x << "," << y << ")" << endl;
00816                                 streamCompare << "\tIntensity:  GCOS = " << gcosEntry.Intensity << "\tCalvin = " << fusionEntry.Intensity << endl;
00817                                 streamCompare << "\tPixels:     GCOS = " << gcosEntry.Pixels << "\tCalvin = " << fusionEntry.Pixels << endl;
00818                                 streamCompare << "\tStdv:       GCOS = " << gcosEntry.Stdv << "\tCalvin = " << fusionEntry.Stdv << endl << endl;
00819                         }
00820                 }
00821 
00822                 if (!ignoreMask)
00823                 {
00824                         if(fusion.IsMasked(i) != gcos.IsMasked(i))
00825                         {
00826                                 ++diffMasks;
00827 
00828                                 compareResults = false;
00829                                 if (detailedDiffFile)
00830                                 {
00831                                         if (fusion.IsMasked(i))
00832                                         {
00833                                                 streamCompare << "Is Masked by index(" << i << "), Calvin == true" << endl << endl;
00834                                         }
00835                                         else
00836                                         {
00837                                                 streamCompare << "Is Masked by index(" << i << "), Calvin == false" << endl << endl;
00838                                         }
00839                                         if (gcos.IsMasked(i))
00840                                         {
00841                                                 streamCompare << "Is Masked by index(" << i << "), GCOS == true" << endl << endl;
00842                                         }
00843                                         else
00844                                         {
00845                                                 streamCompare << "Is Masked by index(" << i << "), GCOS == false" << endl << endl;
00846                                         }
00847                                 }
00848                         }
00849 
00850                         if(fusion.IsMasked(x,y) != gcos.IsMasked(x,y))
00851                         {
00852                                 compareResults = false;
00853 
00854                                 if (detailedDiffFile)
00855                                 {
00856                                         if (fusion.IsMasked(x,y))
00857                                         {
00858                                                 streamCompare << "Is Masked by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "), Calvin == true" << endl << endl;
00859                                         }
00860                                         else
00861                                         {
00862                                                 streamCompare << "Is Masked by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "), Calvin == false" << endl << endl;
00863                                         }
00864                                         if (gcos.IsMasked(x,y))
00865                                         {
00866                                                 streamCompare << "Is Masked by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "), GCOS == true" << endl << endl;
00867                                         }
00868                                         else
00869                                         {
00870                                                 streamCompare << "Is Masked by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "), GCOS == false" << endl << endl;
00871                                         }
00872                                 }
00873                         }
00874                 }
00875 
00876                 if(fusion.IsOutlier(i) != gcos.IsOutlier(i))
00877                 {
00878                         ++diffOutliers;
00879 
00880                         compareResults = false;
00881                         
00882                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00883                         {
00884                                 if (fusion.IsOutlier(i))
00885                                 {
00886                                         streamCompare << "Is Outlier by index(" << i << "), Calvin == true" << endl << endl;
00887                                 }
00888                                 else
00889                                 {
00890                                         streamCompare << "Is Outlier by index(" << i << "), Calvin == false" << endl << endl;
00891                                 }
00892                                 if (gcos.IsOutlier(i))
00893                                 {
00894                                         streamCompare << "Is Outlier by index(" << i << "), GCOS == true" << endl << endl;
00895                                 }
00896                                 else
00897                                 {
00898                                         streamCompare << "Is Outlier by index(" << i << "), GCOS == false" << endl << endl;
00899                                 }
00900                         }
00901 
00902                 }
00903 
00904                 if(fusion.IsOutlier(x,y) != gcos.IsOutlier(x,y))
00905                 {
00906                         compareResults = false;
00907                         
00908                         if (detailedDiffFile)
00909                         {
00910                                 if (fusion.IsOutlier(x,y))
00911                                 {
00912                                         streamCompare << "Is Outlier by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "), Calvin == true" << endl << endl;
00913                                 }
00914                                 else
00915                                 {
00916                                         streamCompare << "Is Outlier by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "), Calvin == false" << endl << endl;
00917                                 }
00918                                 if (gcos.IsOutlier(x,y))
00919                                 {
00920                                         streamCompare << "Is Outlier by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "), GCOS == true" << endl << endl;
00921                                 }
00922                                 else
00923                                 {
00924                                         streamCompare << "Is Outlier by x,y(" << x << "," << y << "), GCOS == false" << endl << endl;
00925                                 }
00926                         }
00927                 }
00928 
00929         }
00930 
00931         // Write a summary report
00932         streamCompare << endl << "Data Comparison Report" << endl << endl;
00933         streamCompare << "Compared " << count << " cells." << endl;
00934         streamCompare << "Intensity differences: " << diffIntensities << endl;
00935         streamCompare << "Stdev differences: " << diffStdev << endl;
00936         streamCompare << "Num Pixels differences: " << diffPixels << endl;
00937 
00938         if (!ignoreMask)
00939                 streamCompare << "Mask differences: " << diffMasks << endl;
00940 
00941         streamCompare << "Outlier differences: " << diffOutliers << endl;
00942 
00943         streamCompare.close();
00944 
00945         if(compareResults)
00946         {
00947 #ifdef WIN32
00948                 DeleteFile(outputFile.c_str());
00949 #else
00950                 remove(outputFile.c_str());
00951 #endif
00952         }
00953         else
00954         {
00955                 errorCode = ComparisonFailed;
00956         }
00957 
00958         return compareResults;
00959 }
00960 
00961 /*
00962  * Helper function, trims excess white space from a std::string value
00963  */
00964 void CELFileComparer::trim(std::string& str)
00965 {
00966   string::size_type pos = str.find_last_not_of(' ');
00967   if(pos != string::npos) {
00968     str.erase(pos + 1);
00969     pos = str.find_first_not_of(' ');
00970     if(pos != string::npos) str.erase(0, pos);
00971   }
00972   else str.erase(str.begin(), str.end());
00973 }
00974 
00975 /*
00976  * Helper function, compares float values to within a tolerance defined by a global constant
00977  */
00978 bool CELFileComparer::CompareFloats(float value1, float value2)
00979 {
00980 #ifdef WIN32
00981         float result = abs(value1 - value2);
00982 #else
00983         float result = (value1 > value2 ? value1 - value2 : value2 - value1);
00984 #endif
00985 
00986         return (result <= float_tolerance);
00987 
00988 }
